title: sadAnandat-tANDavam purivAi
sahitya:
sadAnandat-tANDavam purivAi saccidAnanda naTarAja duraiyE


anupallavi

  padAmbujattai ennuL nATTi parama bhakti paravashattai paghalum iravum ennuL UTTi


caraNam    sariyai giriyai yOga jnAna sAdhanam tarum nAda vaDivAi tUriya muDiyirp-piriyAdunnai
shuddha shakti siddhi nATTi attu vaidamutti kUTTI tOm tOm tadingiaNa tarikiTa takajhimi tOm ena
